lead_paragraph: A security inquiry into visa requests leads to assassination attempts in this film directed by James McTeigue.

headline.print_headline: Review: In ‘Survivor,’ a Thriller About Terrorism, Milla Jovovich Is on the Run
headline.main: Review: In ‘Survivor,’ a Thriller About Terrorism, Milla Jovovich Is on the Run

snippet: A security inquiry into visa requests leads to assassination attempts in this film directed by James McTeigue.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews movie Survivor, directed by James McTeigue and starring Milla Jovovich.
